entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy late this evening. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 overnight. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 27.
